data.text: There is so much to be thankful for. Thanks to our Leaders for joining us today. A special thank you to the @United RSW family for their actions, support for each other, our customers and the community during Hurricane Ian.  @MikeHannaUAL @DJKinzelman @LouFarinaccio @SCarnes1978 https://t.co/J9J19SOngK

data.text: @NoUse4aName781 @united @JennaEllisEsq They used to, but their service is getting bad.  Seems to be customer service everywhere though.

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing
